name: lea-aesthetics-academy
description: LEA Aesthetics Academy - Single-tenant business management platform with integrated practice management and LMS

scripts.db:migrate: env -u DATABASE_URL pnpm dlx prisma migrate dev --schema packages/db/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:generate: env -u DATABASE_URL pnpm dlx prisma generate --schema packages/db/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:seed: bash -lc 'set -a; source packages/db/prisma/.env; set +a; pnpm dlx ts-node packages/db/prisma/seed.ts'
scripts.db:import-templates: bash -lc 'set -a; source packages/db/prisma/.env; set +a; pnpm dlx ts-node packages/db/prisma/import-templates.ts'
scripts.stack:up: docker compose up -d db redis meili
